body_html: This broke when the RunStats interface was added in 6005d63. The author must have forgotten to implement allocate in the class definition. Root cause IMHO is there not being a java_test rule for this example. We have @junit defined in workspace.bzl. Shouldn't be too much trouble to add a BUILD file to that directory with a test rule.

Root cause IMHO is there not being a java_test rule for this example. We have @junit defined in workspace.bzl. Shouldn't be too much trouble to add a BUILD file to that directory with a test rule.
body: This broke when the RunStats interface was added in 6005d639932dd586733bfb3f50a9925f195c3910. The author must have forgotten to implement `allocate` in the class definition. Root cause IMHO is there not being a `java_test` rule for this example. We have `@junit` defined in workspace.bzl. Shouldn't be too much trouble to add a BUILD file to that directory with a test rule.
